lead_paragraph: The ouster of Roger Ailes and an internal inquiry have done little to halt a drumbeat of new accusations of misogyny at Fox News.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM, EMILY STEEL and SYDNEY EMBER

headline.print_headline: The Drumbeat of Harassment Allegations at Fox News Is Not Fading
headline.main: Harassment Crisis Builds at Fox News, Despite Its Swift Response

snippet: The ouster of Roger Ailes and an internal inquiry have done little to halt a drumbeat of new accusations of misogyny at Fox News....
abstract: More women have come forward describing culture of intimidation and misogyny at Fox News, including former daytime host Andrea Tantaros, revealing they got settlements to leave network; removal of chairman Roger Ailes has not stopped sexual harassment accusations, and has led to questions about how much network knew about his behavior.
